3.description: An attempt was made to change an account's password.
3.name: Password Change

4.description: An attempt was made to reset an account's password.
4.name: Password Reset

8.description: A user account was locked out.
8.name: Locked Out

user.description: The user that pertains to the event.

description: Endpoint Account Activity events report when specific user account management tasks are performed, such as a user account is created, changed, deleted, renamed, disabled, enabled, locked out or unlocked.
name: Endpoint Account Activity
